publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4309 Christine Grahame: Take Your Child to Work Day—That the Parliament welcomes all children of those who work here and come with their parents, carers, relatives or teachers on Take Your Child to Work days to help the children to know what it is like to work here and to see the different occupations of everyone, how all the different people here have different tasks and duties, how their Scottish Parliament operates but most importantly what those who look after them do for most of the day.

S2M-4309 Christine Grahame: Take Your Child to Work Day—That the Parliament welcomes all children of those who work here and come with their parents, carers, relatives or teachers on Take Your Child to Work days to help the children to know what it is like to work here and to see the different occupations of everyone, how all the different people here have different tasks and duties, how their Scottish Parliament operates but most importantly what those who look after them do for most of the day. Supported by: Ms Sandra White*
S2M-4309 Take Your Child to Work Day (lodged on 27 April 2006) Michael Matheson*
S2M-4309 Take Your Child to Work Day (lodged on 27 April 2006) Donald Gorrie*
